Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered 3w agoFear of losing money.
A lot of friends I know want to invest only in safe, guaranteed products. They are scared to lose money.
It is a psychological barrier that cannot be learnt or taught. It has to be overcome from within one's own thinking.
Especially so for newbies doing their first trade with their hard-earned money only to see it drop in value. How to condition oneself to the ups and downs of the market is key.0 comments0
